oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Land for Sale!
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Broadside advertisement for the sale of land. R. P. Neely, the clerk and master of the County Court of Hardeman County advertised the sale of a tract of land, containing 100 acres, in the case of John R. Denny, administrator of Lazarus Denny deceased, vs. Molsey J. Denny, William M. Denny, et als. The tract was “known as Lot No. 37” in a larger land survey of 5000 acres, “granted to the heirs of Samuel Polk dec.,” in Hardeman and Madison counties.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Estate sales; County courts -- Tennessee; Hardeman County (Tenn.)--History
Broadsides; Advertisements; Land
